title: Storage with Javascript
text:
Demonstrate the feasibility of user interaction (input, action) with LocalStorage (set, get).


Modify the DOM: take an input, trigger a button to echo the value and save to LocalStorage



Submit to LocalStorage




Read Back from LocalStorage: Trigger the retrieval and echo the value


Retrieve from LocalStorage



One script inserted here handles that all.


make it a content script extension.
